properties.areaDesc: Sun Valley Region; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth/Stanley Basin
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 1:45PM MST until February 16 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello ID
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow, moderate to heavy at times. Total snow
accumulations of 2 to 5 inches in the mountain valleys with 5 to
10 inches in the mountains above 6500 feet. Winds gusting as
high as 40 mph at times.

* WHERE...The Sawtooth, Frank Church, and Sun Valley regions,
including Stanley, Galena, and Ketchum.

* WHEN...From 6 PM Saturday to 3 PM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on difficult to hazardous road conditions at
times.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds may produce areas of blowing
and drifting snow with reduced visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO 3 PM MST SUNDAY
